Knowledge sharing on Crowd Modeling with CAIRO UTM
==================================================

by [attpic](https://fke.utm.my/author/attpic/ "Posts by attpic")
 | Jul 25, 2016 | [ATT](https://fke.utm.my/category/att/)

Alhamdulillah, on the 25th July 2016, ATT, had a sharing session with the CAIRO representative, Assoc. Prof. Ir. Dr. Hazlina Selamat on Crowd Management Model. The sharing session provide inputs on the mathematical and the simulation part of the work. ATT and CAIRO intend to further collaborate in this work for grants application and practical community implementation
